verses.name: Romans 6:18
verses.text: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.

verses.name: Romans 6:19
verses.text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh: for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness.

verses.name: Romans 6:20
verses.text: For when ye were the servants of sin, ye were free from righteousness.

verses.name: Romans 6:21
verses.text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed? for the end of those things is death.
